nkChanged","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"credentialId","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"name","type":"string"},{"indexed":false,"name":"credentialType","type":"uint8"},{"indexed":false,"name":"dateIssued","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"expirationDate","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"description","type":"string"},{"indexed":false,"name":"credentialUrl","type":"string"}],"name":"CredentialChanged","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"previousOwner","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"OwnershipTransferred","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"changeRank(uint256)":{"details":"This function is can be called by the owner of the credential to change the rank of the credential or by the issuer of the credential.\r The rank can only be changed if the rank is not already Diamond.\r The function requires the caller to send the ranking fee in order to change the rank if the caller is the owner.\r The function allows the issuer to directly set the rank without paying the fee.\r The function increments the rank of the credential by one.\r","params":{"_credentialId":"The ID of the credential to change the rank of.\r"}},"getCredentialsByIssuer(address)":{"details":"This function returns all the credentials issued by a given address.\r","params":{"_issuer":"The address to query the credentials of.\r"},"return":"An array of credential IDs issued by the address.\r"},"getCredentialsByOwner(address)":{"details":"This function returns all the credentials owned by a given address.\r","params":{"_owner":"The address to query the credentials of.\r"},"return":"An array of credential IDs owned by the address.\r"},"isOwner()":{"return":"true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.\r"},"owner()":{"return":"the address of the owner.\r"},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.\r"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.\r","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to.\r"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"renounceOwnership()":{"notice":"Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner.\r It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner`\r modifier nodes.documentation:
@dev This modifier checks if the sender is the issuer of the credential.
@param _credentialId The ID of the credential to check the issuer of.
nodes.name: onlyIssuerOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev This modifier checks if the sender is the owner of the credential or the issuer of the credential.
@param _credentialId The ID of the credential to check the owner of or the issuer of.
nodes.name: onlyIssuerOrOwnerOf

changeRank(uint256).details: This function is can be called by the owner of the credential to change the rank of the credential or by the issuer of the credential. The rank can only be changed if the rank is not already Diamond. The function requires the caller to send the ranking fee in order to change the rank if the caller is the owner. The function allows the issuer to directly set the rank without paying the fee. The function increments the rank of the credential by one.

params._credentialId: The ID of the credential to change the rank of.

getCredentialsByIssuer(address).details: This function returns all the credentials issued by a given address.

params._issuer: The address to query the credentials of.

getCredentialsByIssuer(address).return: An array of credential IDs issued by the address.

getCredentialsByOwner(address).details: This function returns all the credentials owned by a given address.

params._owner: The address to query the credentials of.

getCredentialsByOwner(address).return: An array of credential IDs owned by the address.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
